statements: SELECT * FROM asset_metadata;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, author FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, version FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, author FROM asset_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND version >= 2;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, created_at FROM asset_metadata WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata WHERE version > 5 ORDER BY last_modified DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT asset_name, created_at FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'Image' AND version >= 3 ORDER BY created_at;
SELECT author, version FROM asset_metadata WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND last_modified < '2021-03-01';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'document';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, created_at FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_description FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata JOIN version_control ON asset_metadata.asset_id = version_control.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_id = 'a12b3c4d-5678-90ef-1234-567890abcdef'
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'document'
SELECT asset_id, asset_description FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY asset_id DESC
SELECT * FROM version_control WHERE version_creator = 'John Doe' AND created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY version_id ASC
SELECT version_number, version_notes, version_creator FROM version_control WHERE asset_id = 'a12b3c4d-5678-90ef-1234-567890abcdef'
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, created_date FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size, modified_date FROM assets ORDER BY modified_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM versions WHERE version_number > 5;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size FROM assets WHERE asset_size > 100 ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(asset_size) AS max_size, MIN(asset_size) AS min_size FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, version_number, version_description FROM assets JOIN versions ON assets.asset_id = versions.asset_id WHERE versions.version_number > 5 ORDER BY version_number ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date FROM projects WHERE project_manager LIKE '%John%' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_metadata WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, version_number FROM asset_metadata INNER JOIN asset_versions ON asset_metadata.asset_id = asset_versions.asset_id;

SELECT project_name, asset_name, version_number FROM project_metadata JOIN project_assets ON project_metadata.project_id = project_assets.project_id JOIN asset_metadata ON project_assets.asset_id = asset_metadata.asset_id JOIN asset_versions ON project_assets.version_id = asset_versions.version_id;
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_metadata WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT asset_name, version_number, created_on FROM asset_metadata JOIN asset_versions ON asset_metadata.asset_id = asset_versions.asset_id ORDER BY created_on LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_name, asset_name, version_description FROM project_metadata JOIN project_assets ON project_metadata.project_id = project_assets.project_id JOIN asset_metadata ON project_assets.asset_id = asset_metadata.asset_id JOIN asset_versions ON project_assets.version_id = asset_versions.version_id WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_size > 100;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(tag) AS tag_count FROM asset_tags GROUP BY asset_id HAVING COUNT(tag) > 5;
SELECT asset_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_creation FROM assets GROUP BY asset_id;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_size > 100;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM assets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT AVG(asset_size) AS average_size, COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM assets;

SELECT project_name, asset_name, tag FROM projects JOIN project_assets ON projects.project_id = project_assets.project_id JOIN assets ON project_assets.asset_id = assets.asset_id JOIN asset_tags ON assets.asset_id = asset_tags.asset_id WHERE tag = 'important';
